page.title: 08LANDSCAPE _INNES ESTATES
page.content:
One of the major landowners locally are{Innes Estates}.{Innes House}itself is owned by{Captain Iain Tennant}, the {Lord Lieutenant of Moray} and husband of{Lady Margaret Ogilvy}.
The{Estates}comprise: { 1020}acres of{woodland } (mainly pine woods) { 3581}acres of{arable land. ____ Total{4601}acres. ____ Of the {arable land}only 1100 acres are farmed in hand , the other 2481 acres being let.
A large part of the coniferous{ {woodland }is taken up by the{Crooked {Wood},{Lhanbryde}, through which runs a warren of pretty paths and a permanent orienteering course.
